repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:16.04 

RUN mkdir /proxy 
WORKDIR /proxy 

RUN apt-get -qy update \  
&& apt-get -qy upgrade \
&& apt-get -qy --no-install-recommends install apache2-utils squid3 && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

COPY ./squid.conf /etc/squid 
COPY ./init . 

RUN chmod +x init 

RUN touch /etc/squid/squid_passwd 
EXPOSE 3128 
CMD ["/proxy/init"]
